page.title: 06Homes and Families.
page.content: Class 4 consists of 22 Infant children ranging in age from 5 to 7,all of whom live in Ringstead. Their homes differ widely from the Manor House built in 1765 to a new bungalow completed this year 1985. Below are listed some statistics relating to the size of the families,their homes and facilities which contribute to life in 1985. Families with one child 1. Families with two children 10. Families with three children 9. Families with four children 2. Dwellings. Houses 20.Bungalows 2.Pre-war 8. Post-war 14. Brick built 19. Stone built 3. Detached 11. Semi-detached 9. Terraced 2. Modern houses on estate 6.
